DOC.brief_title: Lansoprazole Tablets Special Drug Use Surveillance Gastroesophageal Reflux Disease With Dyspepsia Symptoms
DOC.detailed_description: This special drug use surveillance lansoprazole ( Takepron ) 4-week observational period , design evaluate efficacy gastroesophageal reflux disease patient dyspepsia symptom ( plan sample size , 15000 ) . The dosage regimen follow : - For reflux esophagitis , usual adult dosage 30 mg lansoprazole administer orally daily 8 week . For maintenance treatment repeatedly recurring/relapsing reflux esophagitis , dosage 15 mg lansoprazole administer orally daily . If insufficient efficacy observe , dosage may increase 30 mg administer orally daily . - For non-erosive gastroesophageal reflux disease , usual adult dosage 15 mg lansoprazole administer orally daily 4 week .
